entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
